sample.title: Transcriptor -- manual mode
sample.summary: Transcripts an image with symbols into a Text
sample.description: This template shows how to use the manual mode of the Transcriptor component.
sample.keywords: Transcriptor, Monoalphabetic, Substitution, Image, Manually, Symbol
sample.title: Transkriptor im manuellen Modus

sample.keywords: Transkriptor, Monoalphabetisch, Substitution, Bild, Manuell, Symbol
